items.sentence: Tom goes for a walk every morning before breakfast.
Take this medicine for your cold three times a day.
They were pretty tired after having worked all day.
The police assembled a lot of evidence against him.
There was a fire near the train station last night.
We went to see the cherry blossoms along the river.
Believe it or not, a monster emerged from the cave.
Tom told me that he didn't remember what Mary said.
Do you think it'll be difficult for you to do that?
That was more difficult than I thought it would be.
Tom wanted to stay awake until his father got home.
I wouldn't be surprised if it rains this afternoon.
I know that you want to help Tom, but please don't.
I can help you write that report if you want me to.
You need to understand that Tom will never do that.
You need to pick a better place to pitch your tent.
Do you really think doing that would be worthwhile?
Do you really think doing that would be beneficial?

Do you know what kind of sandwich Tom wants to eat?
